http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0342697/


Shanghai International Film Festival - WON - Best Film
Shanghai Film Critics Awards - WON - Film of Merit
Huabiao Film Awards - WON - Outstanding Actress

Lai Shuangyang runs a tiny curbside restaurant in a crowded Chinese city, trying to hold together her family and business. Her mother is dead, her younger brother has been sent to prison and her older brother has a wife, Xiaojin, who habitually uses the restaurant as a makeshift daycare center. When regular customer Zhuo Xiong Zhou reveals his romantic interest in her, Shuangyang does not know if she can find the time.


Video: XviD, 608x352, 23.976 fps, 800 Kbps, 01h45m06s
